IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.REPERCUSSOES: The Economics and Politics Research Group (EPRG) is the main focal point for discussions and research of four University of Brasilia (UnB) Research Centers (CERME: Research Center on Market Regulation; CIEF: Research Center on Economics and Finance; LAPCIPP: Research Laboratory on Political Behavior, Institutions and Public Policy; MESP: Master's Program in Public Sector Economics) and two UnB schools: IPOL, Institute of Political Science and FACE, School of Economics, Administration and Accounting.The EPRG holds a weekly seminar (http://www.EconPolRG.com/seminars); publishes a joint working paper series (http://www.EconPolRG.com/working-papers); holds an annual meeting on Economics and Politics (http://econpolrg.com/annual-meetings) and coordinates a Visiting Researcher Program.Members of the EPRG publish in top international and national journals and receive regularly top national and international awards for their scholarly research (http://econpolrg.com/member-highlights)

Political Behavior
Game theory, economics of incentives and information, mechanism design and applications

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: This research models the behavior of voters, political candidates and elected representatives. It aims at understanding how decisions that affect the entire society result from the interactions between those agents. The main tools are the theory of games and the economics of incentives. The main institutions analized are reelection, campaign financing, vote splitting, political budget cycles, fiscal and monetary policies, fiscal federalism, the Legislature and the Judiciary.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Economic models of political processes and positive political economics

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Métodos e Modelos Matemáticos, Econométricos e Estatísticos

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SETOR: Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Law and economics or economic analysis of law is the application of economic methods to analysis of law. Regulation is the process of the promulgation, monitoring, and enforcement of rules, established by primary and/or delegated legislation. Antitrust is probably the most important application of Law and economics and has grown to become a filed in its own.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Law and Economics, Regulation and Antitrust

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SETOR: Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: This line of research posits that the key element for economic growth and development are a country's institutions: understood as the rules of the games that give incentives for individuals and groups to engage in cooperative, competitive wealth generating behavior, or rent seeking redistributive behavior. The dependent variable is thus economic performance and the approach is to add to the standard economic explanations of the determinants of this performance institutional elements.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Institutions, Governance and Development

PESQUISADOR-LINHA.NOME-COMPLETO: Pedro Herculano Guimarães Ferreira de Souza
Maria da Conceicao Sampaio de Sousa

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SETOR: Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Finance is the study of how people allocate their assets over time under conditions of certainty and uncertainty. The Asset Pricing studies how the prices of the myriad assets are formed. Corporate Finance studies the important decisions of which investments to execute and how they should be financed. Public Finance studies the financial decisions of public entities. Financial Econometrics is the studies of statistical methods applied to finance variabels.

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SETOR: Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social
Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Research includes work on voting behavior and elections, public opinion, political psychology and political participation where the unit of analysis are ordinary citizens. It examines citizens' political behaviors and attitudes in a democratic context and explores how institutions shape citizens' attitudes and behaviors and how this interaction between institutions and citizens affect, in turn, the democratic process.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Political Behavior

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SETOR: Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Instituições e políticas públicas

PESQUISADOR-LINHA.NOME-COMPLETO: Pedro Herculano Guimarães Ferreira de Souza
Maria da Conceicao Sampaio de Sousa

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SETOR: Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: This research studies problems caused by asymmetric information and strategic behavior among agents and suggests mechanisms to solve these problems. It also tries to determine general properties of economic models where agents have multidimensional types. The main application is the economics of the public sector. The main topics include monetary policy, the public budget, social control, regulation, auctions, health economics, law and economics.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Game theory, economics of incentives and information, mechanism design and applications

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SETOR: Administração pública, defesa e seguridade social
